body: This been translated Amy where yet?

I think it was the yandere getting full revenge for her friend, also, the only thing I really don't get is why she went so far to hurt his wife. She literally did nothing and the yandere girl completely wrecked her life too, just because she was an innocent bystander that married the wrong guy. So fucked up

I don't understand Kanji but i can tell from the pages so long story short this what happened " Even if his wife hated and left him alone, Even if everything he had was lost, Even if the society condemns him only the yandere girl would accept what he had become(Ofcourse everything is her fault to begin with)" and they LIVE HAPPILY EVER AFTER?
Someone explain to me wtf happened
